sentences.english: Now all four companies have merged into aerospace titan Boeing.
sentences.chinese: 如今这四家都被航空业巨擘波音合并掉了。

sentences.english: But these have largely struggled against the industry’s behemoths.
sentences.chinese: 但是它们也很难同本行业内的巨擘竞争。

sentences.english: Julb Law Office is established through the sanction of judicature authorization of Jiangsu Province.
sentences.chinese: 巨擘律师事务所系经江苏省司法厅批准成立。

definition: lit. Mount Tai and the North Star (idiom)/fig. an outstanding figure in one's field
great scholar respected for learning and integrity
person with remarkable academic or artistic attainments/master craftsman/highly esteemed person
an up-and-coming youngster/new talent/a brilliant younger generation
the present age/in office/the current office holder
to be shoulder to shoulder/to be on an equal level with/Taiwan pr. [bi4 jian1]
to run neck and neck/to keep pace with/to keep abreast of/on a par with one another
the most honorable/the most respected/supreme/(archaic) the emperor
